<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Clear the Way](/Feats.aspx?ID=6369) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 207 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetypes** [Mauler](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=256), [Warrior Of Legend](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=286) (Level 6)

**Prerequisites**
[Mauler Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6368)

**Requirements**
You’re wielding a melee weapon in two hands.

</column>

---

You put your body behind your massive weapon and swing, shoving enemies to clear a wide path. You attempt to [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=2380) up to five creatures adjacent to you, rolling a separate [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) check for each target and ignoring the requirement that you have a hand free. Then [Stride](/Actions.aspx?ID=2305) up to half your Speed. This movement doesn’t trigger reactions from any of the creatures you successfully Shoved. Each attack counts toward your [multiple attack penalty](/Rules.aspx?ID=2289), but don’t increase your penalty until you have made all your attacks.
name: Clear the Way
requirement: You’re wielding a melee weapon in two hands.
